title: Can you help me to ID this font?
content:
unfortunately there are no lower case letters. but i hope you know what it is.

some means of communication at [http://co-oponline.net.au/work.php?item=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831143712/http:/co-oponline.net.au/work.php?item=1 "http://co-oponline.net.au/work.php?item=1")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CoopRoofie2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831143712/http:/typophile.com/files/CoopRoofie2.jpg) | 57.69 KB |
author: ginagrandiosa

comments.content: Oh, and [please use a descriptive title next time!](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831143712/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2) Thank you.

i will!

you are great. thank you.

As the author of the node I believe they have the ability to correct the subject after the fact... (Click on the 'edit' button when viewing the thread)

Because of this we should ask those who forget to use a descriptive subject to change it so their post is open to search in the future. I say this because many of the requesters post once and are never heard from again.

@ ginagrandiosa: Can you adjust the subject on this post to be more descriptive? Something like 'Rooftop Cinema Slab Serif ID request' Thanks!
